channel.title: CiTR -- Aural Tentacles
channel.description: An unusual mix of melodic delights that include trancespokenwordhousepunkskareggaethnorockswingpopbluesworldthenewtheoldtheweirdandmore

channel.itunes:subtitle: An unusual mix of melodic delights.

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Mar-2013
item.description: a fun drive into fund drive night. This week CiTR is raising funds to keep the station updated with modern broadcasting equipment. Any and all donations to CiTRs' fund drive is most appreciated. Call UBC-UNIT before March 7 to donate.You can sponsor AURAL TENTACLES right now and continue to enjoy cool music for cool people. Thank you Pierre
item.itunes:subtitle: fund drive night

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Feb-2013
item.description: last show before CiTR's annual fund drive. listen Thursday night/Friday morning at midnight Feb 28/29 2013 for more details. Support CiTR. We play the music for you!!!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Nov-2011
item.description: a mixed bag. music from the 1930's to today. Sex Pistols,Angry Samoans,Manu Chau,David Lynch,William Shatner,Johnny Cash,Cab Calloway,Billie Holiday, Woody Guthrie,Buck Owens,leadbelly,Nouvelle Vague,Calexico,OMD,and many more. CiTR's annual fund drive is on all week long. AURAL TENTACLES WOULD LIKE TO THANK JAMES B. /MOM /TED G./ ROB /and TIM FOR HELPING TO SUPPORT CITR RADIO. YOU PEOPLE ROCK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Nov-2010
item.description: if you enjoy aural tentacles please pledge your donation to CITR's longest lasting late nite show during CITR's annual fund drive to update and maintain our broadcasting equipment so that we can continue to bring you non commercial music that you will not hear any where else. CITR is an independent non profit radio station that needs your support. Listeners can call 604 822-UNIT on Thursday ,Nov 18 at midnite untill Friday ,Nov19 at 2am. Podcast listeners can donate until 5:00 Nov 25.
